meanings.definition: Emitting or reflecting bright, flickering light
meanings.sent1: The stars in the night sky looked sparkly.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was sparkly under the disco ball.
meanings.sent3: The sparkly water in the fountain made the ducks dance.
meanings.sent4: The sparkly eyes of the child lit up with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sparkly diamonds on her ring dazzled everyone.

meanings.sent1: The sparkly snowflakes fell gently from the sky.
meanings.sent2: The sparkly sequins on her shoes caught the light.
meanings.sent3: The sparkly glitter on the card made it magical.
meanings.sent4: The sparkly fish scales shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sparkly stars on the Christmas tree twinkled all night.

meanings.definition: Having a lively or vivacious quality
meanings.sent1: Her sparkly personality always brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The sparkly conversation at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent3: The sparkly dance moves of the toddler were adorable.
meanings.sent4: His sparkly wit made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The sparkly laughter of the children filled the playground.
